captions.text: It feels so cold on my way to work today
Times that I have been running, looking ahead
Couldn't even go on vacation this summer
This is not the life I wanted

Makes me think of the past
when I used to wear school uniforms
Never worried about what I should wear
Didn't forget about name tag
Combing her hair, the girl who used to dream
Back to those happy days (to those days)
I want to go back (want to go back)
Childish girl of clean face with no make up
Everyday I'm changing
I want to go back
I miss those happy days when I used to laugh so hard
I fell asleep in my mom's arms
My house used to be small but it was cozy
Actually it was not mine, just rented
But I miss my old town today of all days
My dad came back with red nose everyday
I waited for him everyday
I miss my dad who used to give me pocket money
Back to those happy days (to those days)
I want to go back (want to go back)
Childish girl of clean face with no make up
Everyday I'm changing
I want to go back
I miss those happy days when I used to laugh so hard
I want to be a time-traveller, even for a day
I want to smile, thinking back of the past
I thought I would be happy if I become an adult
Thought that I will be just like the main character of a drama
Now I think of those days when my heart fluttered
My first love that I liked so much
I miss the times when we used to walk together in our uniforms

title: [MV] SunnyHill(써니힐) _ Child in Time(교복을 벗고) (Lip ver.)

comments.text:
이 노래를 듣다보니 샹송가수 Elsa 노래 Quelque chose dans mon coeur 내 맘속에 그 어떤 것 그 노래가 생각이 
마니 나네욤 Elsa의 어리고 순수한 유년시절을 생각하며 부른 노래인데 이 노래가 고딩때 순수한 모습을 노래하는 모습이 비슷해보이네욤 
ㅋㅋㅋ ㅎㅎㅎ﻿

comments.text:
For about four-five years I have been a huge kpop fan only because of Big 
Bang and 2NE1, I've never followed or kept up with any kpop group as much 
as I did for BB and 2NE1.. this is the first girl group I've watched that 
has such soothing songs and is so completely different from SISTAR, Miss A, 
T-ARA and 2NE1... I must say I've just fallen in love with Sunny Hill!!! ﻿

Funny how I'm not Sunny Hill's fan at all but enjoy all of their songs. I

songs, but don't follow the group and don't know who each member is.

so different from your regular kpop lyrics. The melody is good as well and 
together with the lyrics gives off a warm feeling.﻿

comments.text:
Me too. But I'm a H:LL3R fan since they debut but in their debut they have 
only 3 members Janghyun, Jubi and Seungah. and i'll enjoy their songs in 
many concept. ^*^ By the way there's Kota at beginning and she debut in 
Sunnyhill in Mamma Mia era with Narsha from Brown Eyed Girls and she is a 
maknae from the group. **0:16** and the 2nd beginning part is Seungah *
*0:34** She is original member of Sunnyhill since debut. and Also there is 
Jubi at the Chorus Part and she is the original member of Sunnyhill since 
debut too like Seungah. But at the 2nd verse is Misung **1:30** She debut 
in Sunnyhill in Midnight Circus era. But from now they no have leader from 
this Group. The former leader & member in sunnyhill is Janghyun he is a 
male member only from sunnyhill. He is leaving from sunnyhill because from 
discharging from military service but he is a producer from sunnyhill song 
from now. :) sorry if i have a bad english. i'll try my best for you to 
know them. ^*^
